metadata.title: CVE-2024-29133 on Ubuntu 24.10 (oracular) - medium
metadata.description:
Out-of-bounds Write vulnerability in Apache Commons Configuration.Thisissue affects Apache Commons Configuration: from 2.0 before 2.10.1. Usersare recommended to upgrade to version 2.10.1, which fixes the issue.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2024-29133` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

libcommons-configuration2-java - 2.10.1-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: commons-configuration2 package in oracular, is related to the CVE in some way and has been fixed (note: '2.10.1-1').
